name: CMGT_EXT_DATA_ResidentialPermit_CaseStudioFields
description: Data rule for Residential Permit studio fields
sail_code:
a!match(
  value: ri!title,
  equals: "Commercial Solar Farm Approval",
  then: a!map(
    caseType: recordType!CMGT Residential Permit Solar Permit (DEMO)(
      recordType!CMGT Residential Permit Solar Permit (DEMO).friendlyId: ri!friendlyId,
      recordType!CMGT Residential Permit Solar Permit (DEMO).mountedFlush: rule!CMGT_EXT_UTIL_RandomBoolean(),
      recordType!CMGT Residential Permit Solar Permit (DEMO).typeOfWorkId: 2,
      recordType!CMGT Residential Permit Solar Permit (DEMO).solarEquipmentTypeId: rule!CMGT_EXT_UTIL_RandomInt(between: { 1, 6 })
    ),
    category: recordType!CMGT Residential Permit (DEMO)(
      recordType!CMGT Residential Permit (DEMO).friendlyId: ri!friendlyId,
      recordType!CMGT Residential Permit (DEMO).estimatedCost: 50000,
      recordType!CMGT Residential Permit (DEMO).estimatedStartDate: rule!CMGT_EXT_UTIL_RandomDateTime(
        fromDate: now(),
        toDate: a!addDateTime(startDateTime: now(), months: 2)
      ),
      recordType!CMGT Residential Permit (DEMO).structureTypeId: rule!CMGT_EXT_UTIL_RandomInt(between: { 1, 4 }),
      
    )
  ),
  equals: "Solar Expansion in Residential Areas",
  then: a!map(
    caseType: recordType!CMGT Residential Permit Solar Permit (DEMO)(
      recordType!CMGT Residential Permit Solar Permit (DEMO).friendlyId: ri!friendlyId,
      recordType!CMGT Residential Permit Solar Permit (DEMO).mountedFlush: rule!CMGT_EXT_UTIL_RandomBoolean(),
      recordType!CMGT Residential Permit Solar Permit (DEMO).typeOfWorkId: 1,
      recordType!CMGT Residential Permit Solar Permit (DEMO).solarEquipmentTypeId: rule!CMGT_EXT_UTIL_RandomInt(between: { 1, 6 })
    ),
    category: recordType!CMGT Residential Permit (DEMO)(
      recordType!CMGT Residential Permit (DEMO).friendlyId: ri!friendlyId,
      recordType!CMGT Residential Permit (DEMO).estimatedCost: 60000,
      recordType!CMGT Residential Permit (DEMO).estimatedStartDate: rule!CMGT_EXT_UTIL_RandomDateTime(
        fromDate: now(),
        toDate: a!addDateTime(startDateTime: now(), months: 2)
      ),
      recordType!CMGT Residential Permit (DEMO).structureTypeId: rule!CMGT_EXT_UTIL_RandomInt(between: { 1, 4 })
    )
  ),
  equals: "Urban Oasis Residence",
  then: a!map(
    caseType: recordType!CMGT Residential Permit Addition Permit (DEMO)(
      recordType!CMGT Residential Permit Addition Permit (DEMO).friendlyId: ri!friendlyId,
      recordType!CMGT Residential Permit Addition Permit (DEMO).typeOfAdditionId: rule!CMGT_EXT_UTIL_RandomInt(between: { 1, 15 }),
      recordType!CMGT Residential Permit Addition Permit (DEMO).constructionTypeId: rule!CMGT_EXT_UTIL_RandomInt(between: { 1, 9 })
    ),
    category: recordType!CMGT Residential Permit (DEMO)(
      recordType!CMGT Residential Permit (DEMO).friendlyId: ri!friendlyId,
      recordType!CMGT Residential Permit (DEMO).estimatedCost: 75000,
      recordType!CMGT Residential Permit (DEMO).estimatedStartDate: rule!CMGT_EXT_UTIL_RandomDateTime(
        fromDate: now(),
        toDate: a!addDateTime(startDateTime: now(), months: 2)
      ),
      recordType!CMGT Residential Permit (DEMO).structureTypeId: rule!CMGT_EXT_UTIL_RandomInt(between: { 1, 4 })
    )
  ),
  equals: "Downtown Retreat Renovation",
  then: a!map(
    caseType: recordType!CMGT Residential Permit Addition Permit (DEMO)(
      recordType!CMGT Residential Permit Addition Permit (DEMO).friendlyId: ri!friendlyId,
      recordType!CMGT Residential Permit Addition Permit (DEMO).typeOfAdditionId: rule!CMGT_EXT_UTIL_RandomInt(between: { 1, 15 }),
      recordType!CMGT Residential Permit Addition Permit (DEMO).constructionTypeId: rule!CMGT_EXT_UTIL_RandomInt(between: { 1, 9 })
    ),
    category: recordType!CMGT Residential Permit (DEMO)(
      recordType!CMGT Residential Permit (DEMO).friendlyId: ri!friendlyId,
      recordType!CMGT Residential Permit (DEMO).estimatedCost: 95000,
      recordType!CMGT Residential Permit (DEMO).estimatedStartDate: rule!CMGT_EXT_UTIL_RandomDateTime(
        fromDate: now(),
        toDate: a!addDateTime(startDateTime: now(), months: 2)
      ),
      recordType!CMGT Residential Permit (DEMO).structureTypeId: rule!CMGT_EXT_UTIL_RandomInt(between: { 1, 4 })
    )
  ),
  default: null
)
